attributes.description:
MOTUS NISSAN & RENAULT MENLYN offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very
own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership
or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come
with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is
101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price
advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard
price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome.

MOTUS MENLYN, where customers become friends

attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 80 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Toyota Bryanston.

attributes.description:
PICANTO 1.2 MT STREET PE
Stunning 2022 model Picanto Street in fantastic condition. Full service history. Central locking, aircon, airbag, electric windows and mirrors. Radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Reverse camera and rear sensors to assist with parking. Manual transmission, great fuel consumption and it gives a smooth and comfortable drive around town. Visit your trusted KIA Konfidence dealership in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this Picanto for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.

attributes.title: 2022 Kia Picanto 1.2 Street

attributes.description: At Kia Konfidence Hatfield we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre-Owned vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125-quality point check, Dekra roadworthy, Dekra Condition report and a valet before being delivered . All vehicles are delivered with a full service history. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs and your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you for a test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome.
